A staff member can be reached quickly by typing ::help
You can earn many useful rewards from completing our achievements
You can view our monsters many drops by clicking the magnifying glass icon!
Donating helps keep the server alive! Check out ::donate today!
You can quickly join our discord by typing ::discord
We have DAILY events that range from Double XP to double minigame points!
You can secure your account by activating your bank pin!
You can find a list of our commands at ::commands
Type ::droprate to view your current Drop Rate boost!
You can donate using OSRS and RS3 Gold! PM Mod Divine for more info.
You can obtain Nex armors + the Zaryte bow from our Custom raid!
You can VOTE or kill bosses for donator!
Enraged bosses armor drops give a Valius mbox while wearing the full set + killing a boss!
The Infernal Chest has a new set of armor that applies burn dmg per piece worn!
Shooting stars give the best mining XP in-game plus some amazing rewards!
Sire drops some unique weapons that have Perks while fighting the Corp Beast!
Kalphite Guardians and the Kalphite Queen now drop Primal armor and weapons!
